blogPost.title: News Analysis: In the final, frenzied days of his administration, Donald Trump’s behavior turned increasingly volatile as he smashed dishware and lunged at his own Secret Service agent, according to Cassidy Hutchinson's testimony. https://t.co/HaRbU20LyN
blogPost.author: The New York Times

previous.title: Breaking News: Gov. Kathy Hochul of New York beat two Democratic rivals to win the primary, setting up a rare competitive governor’s race in the state. https://t.co/eFAde9yC1N

localize.full_text: 速報です。ニューヨーク州のキャシー・ホーチュル知事が民主党のライバル2人を破って予備選に勝利し、同州では珍しい競争的な知事選になる。https://t.co/eFAde9yC1N。
爆炸性新闻。纽约州长Kathy Hochul击败两个民主党对手，赢得初选，为该州罕见的竞争性州长选举奠定了基础。https://t.co/eFAde9yC1N。
爆炸性新聞。紐約州長Kathy Hochul擊敗兩個民主黨對手，贏得初選，爲該州罕見的競爭性州長選舉奠定了基礎。https://t.co/eFAde9yC1N。

next.title: In a two-hour testimony, Cassidy Hutchinson, a former White House aide, became one of the most forceful and compelling sources to testify about Donald Trump’s unhinged behavior during the Jan. 6 attack on the Capitol. https://t.co/iyqLu7JaF5
